descriptionHtml:
I'm not good at English.Please forgive my poor English.
This mod strengthening the magic like a Japanese game or TV animations.
For example, you can get some bonus according to growth in amount of magicka.
This mod consists of three esp files. You may choose what you like.
These are compatible with any other mod, if game balance is good.

Force Of Magicka.esp

You can get some magical bonus according to growth of magicka attribute.

Magicka bonus (By WeakerEffects Edition)
Resist Magic bonus +5% / MAX +25%  (+4% / MAX +20%) 
Magicka RegainSpeed bonus +50%(+20%)
Spell Power bonus(*) +5%(+2%)
(* Exclusion Restoration spells)

You can get these bonus every 20points of growth.
(When your magicka point is fortified by potions or enchantment or foods,
your magical bonus of the part will become invalid.)


Robe & Staff.esp

You can get magical bonus & penalties according to the state of equipment.
Especially equipment of staff,daedlic-artifact and heavy-armor
comes to bring about a serious change.
(When you equip the shield, you'll get a penalty.
But you can avoid penalty using "Staves of Skyrim" in that case.)

Equipment bonus

If you don't equip any armors. Spells power +15%
If you equip a staff. Spells power +30%. Magicka regenerates +50%.
If you equip a daedlic artifact. Destruction & Conjuration spells power +25%. Magicka regenerates +50%.
If you equip a daedlic weapon. Destruction & Conjuration spells power +20%.
If you equip an eleven weapon. Destruction spells power +15%.
If you equip a silver weapon. Restoration spells cost -15%.

Equipment penalty

If you equip shield. Spells power -10%
If you equip heavy armor. Spells power -15%
(If you equip a staff or artifact or daedlic weapon
you can avoid these penalties.)

Alternative Spell.esp

Now,you can craft more convenient SpellTomes from existing SpellTomes.
(It is an alternative factor to strengthening the existing spells.)

At first,you have to craft the book "StudyNote: Revamp Magic" on a tanning Rack and read it.
And if you have the power "Revamp Magic",you can remake spells to using powers.
(Required some basic magical perks & knowledge of original spells.)

For example you can craft new spell "castless version"(from some destruction spells).
You can cast it without using long recharge time.
